sections.purpose: To prepare and dispense culture media under controlled heating, mixing, and sterilization.
sections.scope: Applicable to bulk media preparation in Microbiology.
procedure: Add calculated quantities of dehydrated media and purified water to the vessel.
Start the agitator for uniform mixing.
Set the heating temperature and time as per media instructions.
Allow the mixture to reach boiling and ensure complete dissolution.
Apply sterilization cycle if the unit is equipped with in-situ sterilization.
Dispense the sterile media into containers or plates using the dispensing system.
Clean and rinse the vessel and lines thoroughly after use.
precautions: Verify all gaskets and valves are properly seated to avoid leaks.
Use heat-resistant gloves when touching hot surfaces.
Do not overfill the vessel beyond rated capacity.
